attributes.action: Make veterinary care more affordable and improve processes across the board.
attributes.additional_details: The UK government must act urgently to ensure that veterinary care is affordable, fair, and effective. Pets are family members, and no one should have to choose between their pet’s life and financial ruin. This petition calls for fairer pricing, stronger regulations, and better healthcare standards for pets.
attributes.background: Regulate and Cap Veterinary Costs, Improve Veterinary Standards and Processes

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action: 

Create a new independent regulatory body for vets
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717434

Regulate veterinary practices to help make them more affordable
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705499
